description.english: Escape the Dog Heaven and cross the Rainbow Bridge again.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Hundehimmel und überquere die Regenbogenbrücke erneut.
description.french: Sortir du paradis des chiens et traverser le pont de l'arc-en-ciel une nouvelle fois.
description.italian: Scappa dal Paradiso dei cani e riattraversa il Ponte arcobaleno.
description.koreana: 강아지 천국을 빠져나와 다시 무지개 다리를 건너세요.
description.spanish: Escapa del Cielo perruno y cruza de nuevo el Puente arcoíris.
description.schinese: 离开小狗天堂，再次跨越彩虹桥。
description.tchinese: 離開小狗天堂，再次跨越彩虹橋吧。
description.russian: Убеги из Собачьего рая и вернись по Радуге.
description.thai: หนีจากสวรรค์น้องหมาแล้วข้ามสะพานสายรุ้งอีกครั้ง

description.portuguese: Foge do Paraíso Canino e volta a atravessar a Ponte Arco-íris.
description.polish: Ucieknij z psiego raju i ponownie przejdź przez tęczowy most.
description.turkish: Köpek Cenneti'nden kaç ve Gökkuşağı Köprüsü'nü tekrar geç.
description.brazilian: Fuja do Paraíso Canino e atravesse novamente o Arco-íris para o Céu.

description.english: Find the secret tunnel of the pond and dive out of the waterfall.
